name: Shryder
description: Creator of [NanoNativeWallet](https://github.com/Shryder/NanoNativeWallet), [LightweightNanoRPCProxy](https://github.com/Shryder/LightweightNanoRPCProxy), [NanoNodeMonitor](https://github.com/Shryder/NanoNodeMonitor), owner of a Nano representative node that offers a barebones network explorer and free unlimited RPC requests for developers: [ShryNode](https://shrynode.me). Trying to assist with the development of the nano node as much as I can.
